title: Linux aumix Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the aumix command to adjust audio settings on your Ubuntu 22.04 system, including controlling master volume, muting and unmuting audio channels.

meta.title: Linux aumix Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the aumix command to adjust audio settings on your Ubuntu 22.04 system, including controlling master volume, muting and unmuting audio channels.
meta.keywords: aumix, audio, volume, mute, unmute, Ubuntu, Linux, system configuration
